model.computers

Class ShortestPathComputer

  • java.lang.Object
    • model.computers.ShortestPathComputer

  • public class ShortestPathComputer
extends java.lang.Object
    Class computes the shortest paths that link deliveries to each other and to the warehouse using the Dijkstra algorithm. It's designed to keep track of the shortest path throughout the calls

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  ShortestPathComputer.IntermediateResult
      This class ressembles the trip class but with this inner class tooltip
      class  ShortestPathComputer.Link
      This class wraps sections to make the Dijkstra implementation easier
      class  ShortestPathComputer.LinkTrip

      • init

        public void init(CityMap aCityMap,
                 DeliveryRequest aDeliveryRequest)
        Initializes class to be able to perform the computations
        Parameters:
        aCityMap - the city map in which the deliveries are based
        aDeliveryRequest - a delivery request containing a not null list of deliveries

      • result

        public java.util.HashMap<java.lang.String,java.util.HashMap<java.lang.String,Trip>> result()
        Returns an object containing the shortest paths that link the deliveries of the request to each other and to the warehouse
        Returns:
        a hashmap containing, for each origin delivery, a hashmap containing for each target delivery the shortest path that links the origin delivery to the target delivery
